title: AHS Apocalypse Theory Video
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Theory: I think that Madison will side with the anti-christ but will betray him in the end. she did it with Fiona in coven, and with misty day with burying her a love in the Cemetery also in coven. @MarryGirl Moody

Cordelia has the gift of sight I think she will come into contact with Michael in California somehow.  when they try to track down queenie who was killed at the hotel, cordelia finds her and will use her gift of resurgence to bring her back...maybe when they're on their way back to NewOrleans she somehow touches Michael who is passing her by and she will be made aware that he is the antichrist! That would be a good way to get her to California to set up her role in apocalypse in my opinion 😊
My wig has performed the 7 wonders
What if venable is satan himself. Satan not having a specific gender and she ends up being Satan but under the name Venable?
Never been so excited for a season!!!
